thread.title: Beltronics Previews Major Launch
thread.title_full: Beltronics Previews Major Launch - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Beltronics Previews Major Launch
text:
Beltronics
International Player Set to Begin New Campaign
WEST CHESTER, Ohio , Oct. 13, Beltronics Radar (Beltronics.com) , a premiere category player and innovator of specialty detection protection patents, today announced that they will be making a major news announcement tomorrow, October 14 th at 8 AM ET .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/276014
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/276015
Beltronics is a category leader and is the innovator of the world's only true stealth radar detector, the STi Magnum, designed exclusively for the professional driving market.
With a significant share of the top performing products in the radar detector segment, Beltronics is staging a major media campaign set to kick off tomorrow.
 on the Beltronics product launch, visit Beltronics.com or, call the company direct at 866.709.8744.
About Beltronics
Beltronics is a major brand under the Escort name, the leading manufacturer of high-performance radar and laser detectors and the patented Escort Liveâ„¢ real-time ticket protection network. Beltronics manufactures products under the STi, Pro and Vector brands. The company is headquartered in West Chester, Ohio , with its principal manufacturing facility located in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada . Additional information about Escort, Inc. is available at EscortRadar.com.
